Centralized Crypto Exchange Development

Centralized Cryptocurrency Exchange is the online platform used majorly by the investors to buy and sell the cryptocurrency holdings. When cryptocurrency is billed as decentralized, then how could it be centralized? Centralized in common acts as a middle man which is the intermediator of seller and buyer. Both the parties trust the middle man to finely process their exchange and hand over their liabilities to the respective owner. It is moreover like a bank procedure where two parties have a bank as an intermediary who takes hold of money from both the ends.

A situation may arise where the user forgets the wallet passwords and loses the thousands of digital currency. In this case exchanging helps to safeguard the currency in place of individual investors.

  • Best way to safeguard currency
  • Reduce headache of other party authorization
  • Decreases the risk of losing currency

P2P Cryptocurrency Exchange Software

P2P (peer-to-peer cryptocurrency exchanges) are the decentralized way of selling and purchasing digital currency. P2P allows participants to directly deal with one another without taking any help from a middle man or intermediator. The interactions between both parties are direct and there are no set policies at both the end. This has reduced the extra expenditure given to the intermediator for the deal. The P2P exchanges are directed with pre-programmed software without any interference of middlemen.

  • No middlemen interference
  • No extra fee to pay
  • Best decentralization philosophy
  • Numerous online exchanges
  • Pre-programmed software are medium of communication
  • Good medium to connect with traders worldwide

Decentralized Exchange Development

In centralized, funds can be easily lost as the coins are stored in third-party wallets. To overcome the problems of security, decentralization was introduced which made the proof of keys outmoded and allowed the owner of your assets. Decentralized offers no KYC process and enhances privacy. All the transactions are carried between peer-to-peer via encrypted channels. Nobody regulates the process, the success of the transaction depends on both the parties. Since this exchange platform does not have a third-party setup, therefore, it is more secure.

  • No trading fee
  • Anonymity
  • Advanced security
  • (STeX) systems are encrypted
  • Worldwide reach to trade
